program

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • program.Database
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Interaface between Java and MySQL. Tranlates the database querries to MySQL querries and sends them to the server.
